name: Ginger Nix
text: So grateful for RedDog! My work schedule is inconsistent, yet they always are available and flexible when things change. They take great care of my Westie, and I look forward to each update they give when I have to be away.

resp.text: Thank you very much Virginia!! It’s our pleasure to be of service and we are grateful for your trust and patronage 😊😊😊

name: Milk & Honey Baking Co.
text: RedDog has been a lifesaver for me! I have a difficult work schedule, and Karl has worked very hard to find a sitter that can accommodate my unusual schedule. I have used multiple RedDog sitters over the last 2 years, and they have all been very responsible and reliable. It gives me peace of mind to know that my fur baby is taken care of while I’m at work. I particularly like that they send text updates and accept payment via Venmo. They are very flexible and easy to work with. I would highly recommend giving them a chance to care for your fur babies!

resp.text: Thank you so much Heather and we are honored to be of service to you 😊 we appreciate your long patronage!!

name: Susan DeRamus
text: We have been clients of RedDog Sitting for 7 years and have been unusually pleased with their services for our cats when we are away from home. The reservation process is very convenient, even with last minute travels. The updates and pictures that we receive via texts are a great comfort when we are traveling.

resp.text: We appreciate you! Thanks for this 😊👍

name: Sara Ruth
text: Red Dog is been absolutely wonderful. They’re reliable and always send pictures updates from their visits. My work schedule changes on short notice and they are very flexible with last minute changes. We are grateful to have found a trustworthy dog sitting service for our pup!

resp.text: Thank you so much Sara! We so appreciate your words and your patronage 😊 It’s our pleasure to be of service to your sweet pup pup ❤️

name: Gale Jacobs
text:
Piper, our 4 yr old Yorkie just loves Lauren!  And, we love receiving daily updates about her walks along with the cutest pictures!  We have used Red Dog for the past four months and simply couldn’t be happier!  They are always so pleasant and go the extra mile to help when needed.  Thanks for loving Piper!
—Sharon and Gale Jacobs

resp.text: Thank you so much 😊 we appreciate you and your patronage and Lauren loves her time with Piper ❤️❤️❤️

name: Karen Kelley
text: This team is amazing, they really care about your pet and go the extra mile to ensure your pet is happy and cared for.  They are very flexible with scheduling from week to week.  Best of all the individuals that care for your pet are highly communicative through texts and photos, highly professional and always provide TLC-my senior dog loves them!!!  If you are looking for a trustworthy team to take care of your furry family member RedDog is the service for you.

resp.text: Thank you very much Karen!! We love your pup pup and are always happy to be of service ❤️❤️❤️

name: Brooke Kaplan
text: Highly recommended RedDog sitting! They always go above and beyond treating our pups just like they are their own.

resp.text: Thank you so much Brooke! 😊😊😊 we appreciate our relationship with you and family and look forward to many returns!

name: Cara Basilio
text: I have had the best experience with them and would highly recommend! They really treated our puppy as if she were their own and we never had to worry about her when they were there. Kayla and Karl are absolutely phenomenal!

resp.text: Thank you so much for allowing us to care for your sweet puppy 🐶!! We appreciate you 😊

name: Michelle Simpson
text: Wow! Best customer service, awesome communication, happy animals, happy customer! Two people came to introduce themselves and get familiar with our animals. We went on our trip, no problems at all. I love the idea if one of the caregivers gets sick, another one can step right in. We got updates with photos after each visit. It was so easy and they checked in after our trip to make sure everything met our expectations. They stayed 45 minutes each visit and we got awesome pics and updates of each visit. I will always use them.

resp.text: Thank you so much for this wonderful review Michelle! 😊 We are happy to hear you are satisfied and love your crew ❤️ We look forward to many returns!

name: Awake Siren
text: If you need a pet sitter, these are the folks to call. 100% trustworthy, reliable, pet loving  people.

resp.text: Thank you for this awesome endorsement and validation! 😊😊😊 It helps keep us in business during these trying times

name: Tracie Alvis
text: I use Red Dog to walk my fur baby. They have been great and very reliable. My Dog gets so excited when he sees them for his daily walks. I highly recommend them for your walking/pet sitting needs. .

resp.text: Thank you for this wonderful review! It was our pleasure to be of service and we look forward to caring for your pup pup in the future 😊

name: Tim Cebula
text: Our Red Dog experience was wonderful, start to finish. The service is incredibly responsive and well organized. Our sitter was professional, prompt, and caring--we felt we could rest easy knowing Callie and Emma would be in good hands during our trip. We got regular photo updates, and communication was open and easy throughout. We also love that it's a local business, as opposed to regional or national chains. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you Tim! Means a lot 😊😊😊

name: Taryn Temples
text: We have used Red Dog Sitting since our yellow lab, Cooper, was just a puppy.... He is 9 years old now! Red Dog has been so good to us! They are reliable and consistent, and I love getting pictures/updates during the work day, knowing our boy is being loved on while we are gone. We can have crazy work schedules sometimes, and Red Dog is always able to help us out when schedules change unexpectedly. We are so thankful to have found Red Dog when we first moved to Birmingham!

resp.text: Thank you Taryn! We appreciate our long relationship with you and the trust 😊😊😊

name: Heather Jamison
text: Whenever we cannot take care of our pups, we use RedDog to take care of them.  We never have to worry about them when RedDog visits because we know that our dogs will be loved, played with, and well taken care of.  We also love getting text updates and seeing how our pups are doing without us.  It makes being away easier on both us and our sweet dogs.  Karl and his sitters go above and beyond to take care of our dogs, and I don't know what we would do without them!

resp.text: Thank you Heather! We appreciate you and your trust. We look forward to many returns 😊

name: Rachel Lich
text:
My dogs would come home anxious and off for days after being boarded, but with Red Dog I finally feel comfortable leaving town for longer than a day. I don’t have to spend my whole trip worrying about how they’re doing because they send pictures and an update every visit. The sitters who have taken care of my pups always accommodate me, even with my crazy dog mom questions and requests. And most importantly, my dogs always love them!!
The owners are such a lovely couple- and so quick to respond. I have no problem trusting they will take care of my dogs and my home.
I always recommend Red Dog Sitting to every pet owner I know.

resp.text: Thank you so much Rachel, we appreciate your kind words. At your service! 😊

name: dk mc
text: The sitters are great!  My pups get such good care while I am traveling.  I completely trust them with my 2 dogs and with my home.  They’ve become part of the family.  It is comforting to know that my babies are well taken care of when I am away!

resp.text: Thank you very much Debbie! You are family to us too 😊

name: Melanie C.
text: Karl and his team are great. Very responsive and I know my dog loves to see her sitter everyday. I love that I get updates and pictures throughout the visit. I know my pup is safe with RedDog Sitting. I highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you very much!! We appreciate it 😊

name: Rebecca Leigh
text: I have been using Red Dog Sitting Services for about a year. They have taken away the stress and worry I used to feel when I had to leave my pets.   They are super to easy to work with and I LOVE getting the updates/pics from their visits.  I have 4 cats/2 dogs and I get an update about every single one of them 😊.  I am so thankful for these people and would highly recommend to anyone who is looking for a reliable, caring pet sitter.

resp.text: Thank you Rebecca! We appreciate the trust and look forward to many returns 😊

name: Christi Brewer
text: Red Dog Sitting is fantastic! They have cared for my 2 dogs for more than 3 years and have been completely reliable and trustworthy. Every sitter I have had experience with through Red Dog has been awesome. They always send text updates about their visit along with pictures of my dogs. They are also very accommodating to my travel. I try to give as much notice as possible, but there are a few times that they've worked with me on short notice as well. I would recommend Red Dog to any pet owner!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review! We really appreciate this 😊😊😊

name: Dot The Destroyer
text: We have had wonderful experience with boat long vacation stays and day visits. Our pets are happy relaxed and well cared for. 5 stars.

resp.text: Thank you Dot! We appreciate your confidence 😊😊😊

name: Sarah McMinn
text: We use RedDog for dog walking services. I love that our pup Nola has regular walkers who know her and her needs. They send pictures and a brief update after the walk to let us know how our pup is doing! Owner Karl is so great to work with. I work a varied schedule and Karl checks in with me each week to find out my needs. He is flexible and has been able to assist with last minute schedule changes. I recommend them 100%.

resp.text: Thank you for this Sarah!! We appreciate you and love Nola ❤️❤️❤️

name: Cheryl Kersnowski
text: My experience with Karl and Tim at RedDog Sitting Services, LLC has exceeded my expectations.  On the business side Karl is professional and organized, and Tim is a wonderful, reliable and kind sitter for my two pups.  He communicates every day and loves my babies in my absence.  I highly recommend RedDog Sitting Services.

resp.text: Thank you for this wonderful review and at your service Cheryl!! 😊😊😊

name: Kelly Stanton
text:
I cannot even describe how wonderful the dog sitters at Red Dog sitting are! We first contacted Red Dog to care for our 3 older dogs because boarding them was too stressful. Our dogs needed medication multiple times each day and they were just more comfortable in their own home. We knew from the first time we met Cydney and Kayla that we could trust our babies with them. We were thrilled by how much all 3 dogs loved each of the dog sitters who came to take care of them. We could see they were well cared for in the many pictures sent to me after each visit. It was so nice to be able to go on vacation and not worry about our elderly dogs at home.
Now we have a puppy who we do not want to leave in his crate all day while we are at work.  So we have the best dog sitter in the world come visit him, take him out to potty and a short walk each day. I honestly think Kayla is our puppy's favorite person.  And if Kayla can't visit him one day, Red Dog sitting arranges for another awesome sitter to come visit without me even having to worry about making arrangements. I am so grateful to Red Dog Sitting!

resp.text: Thank you so much Kelly! We appreciate your thoughtful review and it is our pleasure to be of service 😊

name: Tom Williams
text: Been using this pet sitting service for years because they are simply the best.  Reliable, professional, handle pets with medical needs, etc.  Plus, they bring in the mail, newspapers and water plants if requested. Best of all, they send daily texts with detailed updates and pics of your pets and plants to give you the peace of mind knowing that everything is going well back home. We would never consider using any other service!

resp.text: Thank you so much! It’s our pleasure to be of service 😊

name: Makaira Casey
text: There aren't enough stars in the galaxy to properly rate RedDog. RedDog managed walks, sits, and assorted other services for my two dogs seamlessly for years. I would venture to say they were more diligent about my pups' care than I. Every service was provided with the most genuine care.

resp.text: Thank you for your very kind words Makaira!! It was our pleasure and honor to serve you and your pups 😊😊😊

name: Larry Hicks
text: We have used their sitting services several times and have never been disappointed. The sitters are professional and do a great job providing updates and photos after each visit wit the pets. We highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you for this Larry! We appreciate you and look forward to many returns 👍😊

name: matt meyers
text: We use RedDog Sitting Services for our two bloodhounds.  The dog sitters are very professional and take really good care of my babies while I am at work during the day.  When I first called RedDog regarding getting someone to come sit with my dogs they were very attentive to my pet care needs and did an amazing job of pairing sitters that fit my dogs personalities. Believe me caring for two young bloodhounds at one time is very challenging, but they have met the challenge and have amazed me every day with how wonderful they are with my babies. I receive daily pictures showing me the days activities and I am always pleased with how happy and comfortable my babies look with the sitters.  This is truly a great service with people who love and care for the well being of your pet.

resp.text: Thank you so much! We appreciate you!! :-)

name: Chris Appleton
text: Our experience with RedDog has been exceptional.  Their team allows you to travel without any concern that your fur family will be well cared for and loved.  We have been customers for well over five years and appreciate the promptness and attention to detail their sitters provide.  Incredibly accommodating and trustworthy business to work with.

resp.text: Thank you for this wonderful review Chris. We very much appreciate and value our long relationship with you and look forward to many returns!😊

name: Kristen Hardy
text: I have been using Red Dog dog sitting for two years now and they have been great!! I can now go out of town and leave my babies home and not worry!! I am able to go on a lot more vacations knowing that they are well taken care of!!!!

resp.text: Thank you Kristen! We appreciate your patronage 😊

name: Erin Limerick
text: Nikki always does a fantastic job taking care of our 3 dogs when we go out of town. One of them has kidney issues with lots of meds. She does it all perfectly and the dogs love her! Highly recommend Red Dog!

resp.text: Thank you Erin 😊 We really appreciate it!!

name: Hannah Edwards
text: Incredible service! I have been working with Red Dog almost a month now for daily dog walking/pet sitting and it has been a great experience. I have rescheduled visits a million times due to my unpredictable work schedule and Karl has been nothing but accommodating, even at the last minute. Can't thank them enough for taking such great care of my pup when I can't be there!

resp.text: Thank you so much Hannah!! 😊 and, at your service! We appreciate your trust in us 😊😊😊

name: Christoph
text: Karl and his associates have done a fantastic time taking care of our dog. They are always available, have never missed a day we needed them, and are extremely professional. Karl consistently reaches out to us about our needs for the upcoming week because we have such variable schedules. They also do a great job communicating with us on the days that they take care of our dogs. I unequivocally recommend them.

resp.text: Really appreciate this! Thank you Christoph!!

name: Linda Bedwell
text: I never worry about my fur babies when we leave town!  Red Dog is so professional and dependable. They love our pets and allow them to be in the comfort of our home.  Been using them for years!!

resp.text: Thank you for this wonderful review. 😊 We appreciate you!

name: Sally Mcdonald
text: Red Dog has cared for my pups on several occasions. My dogs love the sitters, and I know that they're in safe, friendly hands. The sitters ALWAYS keep me informed with pictures and texts about the dogs. Too, Karl and Sydney have helped me out at a moment's notice when I've been called away unexpectedly. I will continue to entrust my pets to Red Dog Sitting.

resp.text: Thank you Sally 😊! We appreciate your loyalty and trust! And we look forward to many returns

name: Dawn deGraffenried Jones
text: We used RedDog Sitting to take care of our fur babies during the workday and several times when we went out of town.  We knew they were in great hands!  Our sitters were fantastic about sending us texts, emails, and photos documenting their visits, and our pets loved the extra attention when we couldn't be around.  We highly recommend them for your pet-sitting needs!

resp.text: Thank you Dawn 👍😊

name: Tracy Field
text: I have been using Red Dog for several years now to keep my cavalier. She has medical issues so I don’t like to board her. The sitters are wonderful and take great care of Katie. They send lots of pictures and updates so I know she is doing well. I highly recommend them!

resp.text: This is wonderful! Thank you Tracy, we appreciate you 😊😊😊

name: Perry Pope
text: We have used Red Dog Sitting Services numerous times and they have always taken wonderful care of our dogs. One of our dog is older and has a medical condition that requires medication and we completely trust Red Dog with our pups. It’s comforting to know that when we’re traveling our pets are being taken care of. Shout out to Gina she’s great with our pups!

resp.text: We really appreciate the feedback and our relationship with you 😊

name: Carla S.
text: We love Red Dog Sitting Services! They are by far the best in the area. We have used their sitting services for our cats for 7 years and would never use anyone else. The Red Dog owners and pet sitters are wonderful. They are always reliable, professional and caring. Our sitters send a text with photos every visit so we know our babies are safe and well-cared for when we are away. We highly recommend Red Dog Sitting Services!

resp.text: This is wonderful! Thanks Carla 😊😊😊

name: Tabitha Price
text: I have nothing but positive raves about RedDog Sitting Services. They are great communicators, quick response time, but most importantly, they treat my four legged kiddos as their own. Best service I have used!

resp.text: Thank you Tabitha! We’ve really enjoyed working with you and very much appreciate your trust! 👍😊

name: Janice Warren (Jrocks27)
text: I absolutely Love RedDog sitting, they are amazing, Andrew and Deborah were absolutely Phenomenal! They took such great care of our babies when we were away! What would we have done without this company? Thank you with all of our Hearts.

resp.text: Thank you so much Janice! We appreciate you 😊

name: Stephani Shields
text: We have been using them for 4-5 years at least and we are ALWAYS satisfied with the service and care they give our fur babies. They love our babies and the pictures they send make our trips that much better and give comfort and peace of mind. We trust them 100% and wldnt use anyone else!

resp.text: Thank you for this Stephani! We appreciate you and your babies 😊😊😊

name: Stephanie Fowler
text: RedDog has been a blessing to our family. We recently moved to Birmingham with a 15 year old dog that we are so careful with.My first priority was to find caring people who could care for Reesie like we did. The staff at RedDog has gone above and beyond to meet our expectations and more. So thankful!!

resp.text: Thank you Stephanie! We appreciate this and we appreciate your trusting us with sweet old Reesie 😊❤️😊

name: Ray Foushee
text: Red Dog has been helping my family for 5 1/2 years. We have used them faithfully about 8 or more times a year for extended periods of time. We had two St Bernard’s and a cat. Unfortunately only our cat if still with us. Red Dog has always gone above and beyond for all three of our guys. Our Saints required extra attention which Red Dog was always willing to do whatever they needed. They come twice a day for us to take care of our cat now. They have always been such a blessing to our family. I highly recommend them every chance I get. Can’t thank them enough for everything they have done for our entire family!

resp.text: Thank you for the fantastic review, Christie!  :)

name: Kelly Scott
text: Earlier this year, I got a new puppy. And seriously, these folks have helped me raise her when I had to leave her for work and other stuff. They've been great with daily visits and dog-sitting. Even my rescue dog that doesn't like people and lets virtually no one pet him likes the sitters who have come. I'm so glad I found them!

resp.text: Thank you Kelly!! We appreciate your trust and are glad to be of service 😊

name: Debbe Stewart
text:
I have a senior cat, & when I need to leave town, she can stay at home, where she is safe & comfortable, instead of going to an unfamiliar place to be boarded.  Red Dog Sitting is reliable, & professional.  The sitter sends me texts updates (with a photo!) & I am completely comfortable with them, & more importantly, so is my cat!

Best sitting service I could have choosen!

resp.text: Thank you Debbe!!! We very much appreciate your trust and will work hard to maintain that 😊

name: Lia Marie
text: I have been using RedDog for a year and a half for my dog walking derives and they have always provided above and beyond service. They have never missed a visit and are almost always available for even last minute dog walking needs! I know my puppy has been in great hands!

resp.text: Thank you for this Lia! We appreciate you 👍😊👍

name: Elisa Mejia
text: Since 2012 RedDog has been a part of my family.  Scheduling is consistent so I can work worry free and get daily texts about my dogs.  They are supportive and and responsive to changes in schedules.  Customer service and caring!!!

resp.text: Thank you Elisa! We really appreciate this!! 😊

name: Bethany Roberts
text: I have worked with Karl and Cydney for over 5 years and they have taken wonderful care of my cats since day 1.  They are extremely helpful even when circumstances outside the norm arise and I always feel my cats are getting the best care possible when I am away.

resp.text: We love your kitties and thanks so much for this 😻😻😻 We look forward to many returns.

name: jane Elmore
text: Red dog sitting is a life savor.  The walkers and sitters love my dogs as much as I do.  I travel a bit and have 0 concern about leaving my dogs.  They are walked, pampered, and loved while I am gone.  My dogs get so excited when the walkers come.  I can’t say enough great things about them all!

resp.text: Thank you very much Jane!! It’s our pleasure to serve! ❤️😊

name: Jennifer Summar (NextJen)
text: Very reliable and friendly pet sitting service.  Their rates are reasonable, and their sitters are background-checked and reliable.  I love the daily photos and written updates that the sitters send us via text or email while we're away from our fur and feather babies.  Makes you feel good knowing they are being cared for well.

resp.text: Thanks very much for this Jennifer! 😊 At your service!!

name: Livia Daniel
text: We’ve been using Red Dog to take care of our fur babies when we’re out of town for over 8 years.  You couldn’t ask for better pet sitters.  We HIGHLY recommend them if you are looking for someone to love your babies when you can’t be there.

resp.text: Thank you very much Liv!!

name: Casey Howard
text: RedDog has done an amazing job taking care of our dog, Rocky! They're consistent, show up on time, and great communicating with us about any issues or changes needed to Rocky's care. So thankful for these guys!!

resp.text: This is awesome! Thank you Casey!! 👍👍👍

name: Maelynn Cheung
text: Very responsive and helpful in explaining options and process. My pup had a great sitter and we’ve already scheduled for the next visit.

resp.text: We appreciate you Maelynn and look forward to many returns! 😊😊😊

name: Barbara Cole
text: RedDog Sitting is the premiere pet sitting service in Birmingham! The RedDog owners and caregivers were organized, punctual, and responsive. Most of all, our caregivers loved my dog family and sent me daily videos and descriptions of the dogs' behaviors and antics during each visit. Red Dog Sitting visited my dogs Monday - Friday twice each day and provided me great peace of mind while I was at work. If I needed to change the visit schedule, this was easily done. In short, I could not have asked for better companions for my dog family. I love RedDog Sitting and will always be grateful for the professional and loving services the staff provided to me and my dogs. RedDog Sitting is the ONLY pet service I will ever use!

resp.text: This is wonderful! Thank you so much Barbara!! 😊😊😊

name: Marty McArthur
text: They look after cats as well! Excellent excellent service. Well-run business, dependable sitters. They always sent me several texts with pictures of my cat playing or on their laps, would include descriptions of my cat's activities while they were there. They'd scoop the litter box, fill water, add food to the bowl, play with my cat. They would also bring in mail or any packages. They'll even prepare special foods for your pets, so if you have one who needs food cooked etc, they'll be happy to oblige. They are the BEST.

resp.text: Thank you so much Marty! Every review here counts a lot for us 😊

name: Susie Tomberlin
text: Excellent service and care for our furry family members throughout the last 6+ years!  They have treated our pets like they would their own.

resp.text: We really appreciate this! Thank you Susie 😊👍😊

name: Alysia Housey
text: We have been using RedDog Sitting for years! I never have to worry about my dogs while we are away. One of our dogs is a rescue who doesn’t trust easily. The first night the sitter visited him, he was in her lap asking to be petted. I was amazed! RedDog is punctual, professional and the best sitters around by far.

resp.text: Thank you so much Alysia 😊😊😊 We appreciate our long relationship with you

name: Alicia Baldwin
text: We have been with Red Dog since 2011. They have been a life saver. We started with a “zoo” and now have 3 kitties. They are always available and always responsive to any concerns (which have been very few). I can’t imagine trusting my babies to anyone else!

resp.text: Thank you very much for trusting us with your crew for so long! 😊

name: Sally McClanahan
text: We love RedDog because they are 100% reliable and dependable. Our dogs love them and they love our dogs.  They always go above and beyond the call of duty for us and we can always leave town with total confidence that our dogs will be well taken care of.

resp.text: Very appreciated! Thanks Sally :-)

name: Tracy Thornton
text: We love RedDog! The sitters treat Fiona & Fern like family. I also look forward to the updates and pictures each day while we are away! The owners, Cydney & Karl, always respond quickly to requests and questions. We are very happy to recommend RedDog Sitting to pet owners looking for friendly and reliable sitters for their fur babies!

resp.text: Thank you very much for this 👍😊😊😊

name: Joseph Bradish
text: On many occasions, a RedDog staffer has cared for our dogs and cat. Our animals are played with, petted, pampered, walked, fed, whatever we ask for. The sitter sends pictures and updates on every visit, and we just love that! Our mail and newspapers are collected, trash cans get pushed to the curb, and lights are adjusted. It's just an all-around great, great service for our pets and our home. It is peace of mind that we haven't found anywhere else!!

resp.text: Thank you very much 😊😊😊

name: Melanie Reno
text: We have used Red Dog for years and do not trust anyone else with our pets.  I highly recommend Red Dog for any pet sitting/walking needs. Great to work with!

resp.text: Thank you Melanie! We cherish our long relationship with you and look forward to many returns 😊👍😊

name: Jon Beling
text: I’ve been a loyal RedDog customer since 2012. Karl and Cyd are wonderful and treat my dogs like their own. RedDog offers me peace of mind knowing my dogs will be cared for when I’m gone, whether its just for a day or a week.

resp.text: Thank you Jon! We value your patronage very much 👍

name: Cathy Vinzant
text: I have the best experience with RedDog Sitting Services.  The walkers are phenomenal....very attentive to my dogs and always on time.  I get a picture and a note after each walk. They are able to accommodate my schedule even with short notice.  Karl and Cyd work miracles behind the scenes .   I highly recommend this service for the walkers they have to care for my dogs and the administrative side that does all the coordination.

resp.text: This is wonderful! Thanks so much Cathy!! 😊😊🐕🐕

name: Joanna Burleson
text: We love Red Dog!  Our puppets have grown up with Red Dog and they are happy to receive a mid day visit from Red Dog.  Love the feedback and pictures that they provide.  We are very happy with Red Dog and the loving care they give tomLexie and Brooklyn - the golden girls!

resp.text: Thank you Joanna! You are like family to us 😊 it’s been almost 10 years, wow!!

name: Paul Muntner
text: RedDog Sitting have been taking care of my cats for 10 years and has always done an outstanding job. They are very responsive to my needs and take great care of my cats.  I highly recommend them!

resp.text: Thanks so much Paul! You were one of our first clients and we appreciate your trust 😊

name: Donna Dixon
text: This sitting service employs very caring, trustworthy and extremely competent sitters.  Our dogs, over the years, have required administration of many meds and have been "special needs pups."  We have never felt uneasy about leaving them with the RedDog sitters.  They have always provided excellent care.  I recommend them without reservations!

resp.text: Thank you very much Donna! We appreciate you :-)

name: Jeanna McNair
text:
We have used Reddog for years.  We always know our babies are going to be well taken care of.  I recommend them to anyone looking for a pet sitter.  I love the pictures they take.  We can see our babies a couple of times a day even though we aren't at home.  If you need pet care, there is not anyone better!
Jeanna

resp.text: Thank you Jeanna! We cherish our long-time relationship with you and appreciate this very much. 👍😊

name: Steve Reynolds
text: I’ve trusted the care of my pets with Red Dog Sitting for years. I never have to worry about them when we go out of town, no matter how long the trip. I’m confident that my home is secure and those extra little things like getting the mail, picking up the WSJ from the driveway and being on the lookout for packages are nice. The owners are always prompt when contacted and I never hesitate to get in touch with them with special requests. 5 Star Rating is well deserved.

resp.text: Thank you very much for this Steve! We look forward to many returns! 👍👍

name: Elizabeth Kiernan
text: Great service with very involved owners and walkers who are always available and flexible with schedules!

resp.text: Thank you very much Liz!! We appreciate you and look forward to many returns. 😊

name: Louise Yoder
text: Love RedDog Sitting services. I have 2 dogs who hate the kennel. RedDog lets them stay at home and they do a great job. Play with the dogs, texts me photos and make the house look like someone is home. Highly recommend!!!

resp.text: We appreciate you Louise! 😊

name: Patricia Williams
text: RedDog Is amazing!  They are dependable, will accommodate last minute requests, very flexible and will love your pets to pieces!!  I highly recommend them. I’ve been using RedDog for a year and wouldn’t trust anyone else!!

resp.text: We really appreciate this and your patronage- your pups are sweeties and we look forward to many returns 🐶!!

name: Pam Johnson
text: I have used RedDog for over 10 years for both my cats and dogs.  I use them frequently and they are so caring and responsive to any needs.  Also, they can do more than just feed/walk your pets, like mail, watering plants, etc.  All of the sitters have been outstanding and Karl and Cydney are passionate about taking care of animals.  I trust them absolutely.

resp.text: Thank you for this wonderful review 😊 you were one of our first customers and we really appreciate your trust!

name: Rosy Roberts
text: I absolutely LOVE RedDog Pet sitting! I have been using them for about 10 years and I have never been so serene while away. I have several cats and dogs and over the years some of them have had to have medications given. RedDog doesn't charge extra for multiple animals or when meds need to be given. I get pictures and text each time they come to the house. They take care of the cats and dogs, feed fish in the ponds, fill birdfeeders, watch the water level in the pool, etc.  The sitters have even stayed extra during thunderstorms to comfort the pets until the storm passes. At times my flights have been canceled or delayed and I can contact them and get an extra sit or two to cover the unexpected extra time away. The animals love them and are so happy to be home (rather than at a kennel). RedDog is a very professional and caring service that takes the best care of my babies. I have recommended them to several friends who now use them as well. I don't  what I would do without RedDog. If they retire, I'll never be able to travel again! I give them my highest recommendation and have never ever had a pet sitting service that comes anywhere close to how great these people are!

resp.text: Thank you for this wonderful review! We appreciate you!!

name: joel phillips
text: Karl and his team have been pet sitting for us for a little over a year now and have always done a tremendous job. They give us peace of mind knowing that our dog is being taken care of while we are gone and we love the pictures and updates they send us during each visit. We appreciate how flexible they are with our busy and always changing work schedules. Always very professional and dependable!

resp.text: This is really appreciated! Thank you 😊

name: Marybeth Grigsby
text: They always take excellent care of our pets.

resp.text: Thank you very much for this Marybeth!! It means a lot and we look forward to many returns 😊😊😊

name: michael zinnecker
text: Beaux has the greatest time with Gina, Emily, and Regan.  They are very attentive and he is such a ham!  Red Dog Sitting is always very punctual and receptive when I need to make arrangements on short notice.

resp.text: Thanks you for the wonderful review! We appreciate your patronage very much 👍

name: Les Rayburn
text: We have a complicated work schedule, but RedDog always seems to find a way to make it work for us. Their sitters truly treat our pets like babies--which is just what we want. Can't recommend them highly enough!

resp.text: Thank you very much! We appreciate this and look forward to many returns 👍👍

name: JR Davidson
text: We’ve used Red Dog for several months.  They’re great with our two labs, one of which has a bad hip and takes a little more time to handle.  They’ve also been easy to contact and very flexible if we have plans change last minute.  Hope to keep using them for a long time!

resp.text: Thank you very much JR! We really appreciate this and look forward to continuing to be of service 😊

name: Neha Reddy
text: we love this company so much.  such sweet, caring, good people.  they give our precious fur baby so much love :) :)

resp.text: Thank you so much Neha!! 😊😊😊

name: Paul Blanton
text: My wife and I have used Red Dog Sitting Services on four occasions to care for our three cats when we've been away on one- to two-week vacations.  Each time, we've been very pleased with the work their sitters have done.  One thing that was especially nice was the text messages (with pictures) after each visit, updating us on how the cats were doing.  In addition to the cat care (feeding, brushing, cleaning litter boxes), our sitters brought in the mail and packages each day and turned on/off lights.  I can't speak highly enough about the quality of Red Dog's services, and we will definitely use them again.

resp.text: This is very kind and thank you so much Paul! We very much appreciate your patronage 😺😺

name: Blayne Burgess
text: Red Dog did a great job with both my dogs for 4 years. They were always easy to contact and reschedule a visit. Also they always contacted me if anything at all was wrong.

resp.text: Thank you Blayne! We really appreciate it!! 👍

name: Ann D
text: Have used them every vacation for 5 years.  So much easier and less stressful than boarding plus we live for the updates on our furry friend.

resp.text: Thank you for this wonderful review! 😊 We appreciate you!!

name: Debbie Grabeldinger
text: I love the personal touch my pets receive while I’m away and the pictures that I get showing them safe and happy at home.  They have become extended family to us.

resp.text: Thank you so much Debbie! We appreciate you 😊

name: antonio lago
text:
Awesome service, caring and always willing to exceed expectations.
I have use RedDog for a number of years and plan to continue.
Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thank you Tony! We appreciate your patronage very much 😊😊😊

name: Laura C
text: RedDog Sitting is incredible. Kind and caring owners, and wonderful sitters! They really care about our cats, and spend time with them, even taking photos while we are away. I honestly think there’s a part of our cats that don’t mind when we’re gone because they love seeing the sitters so much! And after being with them for two years with pretty solid travel (at least one weekend a month, with trips up to three weeks), we have never had one incident or bad experience. Very grateful to have found them! You cannot go wrong with RedDog Sitting!

resp.text: Laura, thank you so much! We appreciate you!!

name: David Moon
text: I never worried about our pets when Red Dog Sitting was used. The personal is super friendly also.

resp.text: Thank you very much David! 👍😊

name: Lisa Castagna
text: I have been using RedDog Sitting for over a year for my three dogs.  They visit my home every afternoon while I am at work.  They are reliable and even text pictures and messages during each visit.  They have accommodated last minute requests from me when I have needed them on weekends, as well.

resp.text: Thank you very much! We appreciate you :-)

name: chris murchison
text: Red Dog Sitting Services has been a fantastic care provider for our 2 dogs and one cat. We have used them since 2013. They are reliable, punctual, friendly and always willing to help us out in a jam. Cydney and Karl run a top-rate business and we would highly recommend their services to anyone looking for the best!

resp.text: This is wonderful! Thank you Chris 😊 We really appreciate your long-time patronage and love your furries 😊🐕😺

name: Megan Duda
text: I have been using Red Dog Sitting for several years now and don't know what I would do without their help with my dog, Rosi!  They take her on daily 30 minute walks and I know she's a happier and healthier dog because of it.  Cydney and Karl are very responsive and will get back to you in a timely manner if you have any questions or concerns.  I would highly recommend Red Dog if you need any pet sitting services!

resp.text: Thank you very much Megan! We value our relationship with you very much 😊😊😊

name: Jason Alexander
text: We never worry about leaving our pets when we go out of town. We know they are in great hands!

resp.text: Thanks very much for this!! 😊

name: Laura Heidelberg
text: After a very negative experience with a former dog walker (stole over $2k with four theft charges), I was hesitant to allow another person into my home. RedDog Sitting is a local family owned bonded/insured company and from the first meeting have been nothing but professional and courteous. The same sitters walk your dog and if anyone new is added to the circuit RedDog notifies you immediately, orients them to your dog and their routine, and allows you to meet them in person. The sitters are wonderful and provide daily updates with texts and photos from the walk and truly love your dog as their own. RedDog is additionally very flexible and accommodates last minute changes to your schedule. RedDog comes highly recommended and I trust them in my home, which is a  small miracle given our prior history!

resp.text: This is wonderful. Our pleasure and thank you so much Laura!!

name: H Todd
text: I absolutely love Reddog!!! I’ve used them for years. I wouldn’t trust anyone else with my pups.  We use Reddog for weekly visits and overnight sits. Our pets stay at their house, no strange  kennels. Reddog is always professional, on-time and friendly.  And the prices are very reasonable.

resp.text: Thank you Hope! We appreciate our longtime relationship with you and look forward to many returns 😊

name: Kim Dinunzio
text: We have an 11 year old dog who requires a little more attention because of the medications he needs. RedDog sends two sitters a day to be sure that our Bandit gets all the meds and attention he needs while we are away.  They are wonderful in sending updates and pictures daily/nightly to reassure us that everything is fine at home.  Thank you RedDog for your professionalism and good care!

resp.text: Thank you Kim! Everyone loves Bandit and we really appreciate your patronage 😊😊

name: Robert Akscyn
text: RedDog provides excellent pet sitting services at a very reasonable cost. I always appreciate the peace of mind they provide while out of town!!

resp.text: Thank you Robert! At your service 😺😺😺

name: Sandy Morrison
text: Karl, Cydney & their stellar sitting crew have taken care of my fur babies for many many years. We’ve lost 2, but currently have 5 In our fold. Its clear they are committed to truly caring. Wouldn’t use anyone else.

resp.text: Thank you, Sandy, for this awesome review :)

name: Vickie Newman
text: Karl and Cyd have helped me with dog sitting services for over 8 years and have always met my needs.  Local couple with superior customer service.  You can trust them with your most precious furbabies.

resp.text: Thank you for this! We cherish our long relationship with you 😊😊😊

name: Hope Lewis
text: Wonderful customer service...they have taken great care of our fur babies not just dog and car but guinea pigs and turtles too!

resp.text: Thank you very much Hope!! This is really appreciated 😊😊😊

name: Amanda Hardin
text: I adore Reddog!!! We travel in spurts and when we do they take care of our Golden Retriever mix. She is very clingy and it's hard to leave her, but knowing she is in such good hands helps so much!!  We have Reddog visit her twice a day and they will walk her, play with her, snuggle with her (anything we need) and we always get pictures and an update on her activities every single time they visit her. It's very reassuring and the best part is that Toffee is so well loved by her caretakers - Nikki, Kayla and Erin - which is awesome too! They are a great group of folks and I highly, highly recommend them (and I have a high standard for customer service). :)

resp.text: Thank you, Amanda!!  We love Toffee!!!

name: Teresa Minor
text: Hands down the best dog sitting service in Birmingham!  They take excellent care of your babies.

resp.text: Thank very much Teresa! We appreciate you! 😊

name: Dany Hollingsworth
text: We love RedDog. Our 60 lb pound puppy didn’t always play nicely with other dogs his size, so when we boarded him, we always had to request play time was with the little dogs. Sometimes these requests were honored, & sometimes they weren’t, and he was grounded and denied play time. With RedDog, and less cost, we know Cosby is happy, and comfortable. We have an electric fence, so he gets to spend the day chasing squirrels and barking at cars, but he still looks forward to his walk, cuddles and dinner when the sitter arrives to bring him, our mail, and any packages inside. We love the pictures she sends us of a happy dog and the text messages about their time together. The sitter turns on random lamps and such, so our home doesn’t appear so ‘They aren’t home’ and Cosby gets dinner and pettting. The sitter comes back in the AM to offer breakfast, more snuggles and ball throwing before letting Cosby out for yard patrol. With a child playing travel soccer, out of town games pop up with little notice, and it’s nice to be able to count on RedDog.

resp.text: We really appreciate you sharing all this detail and we really appreciate you!! Thank you for taking the time and we look forward to many returns 😊👍😊

name: Sierra Phillips
text: Karl has done a great job managing the dogsitting of our two pups. He gets in contact with us well in advance to schedule visits, and is very flexible with when our schedules change at the last minute, which can occur from time to time. All of his dog walkers send detailed updates with photos after every visit, and we can tell our dogs have expended a lot of energy when we get home after they have visited. We would recommend this service to anyone in the Bham area.

resp.text: Thank you for this Sierra! We really appreciate it and love the pups ❤️

name: Jeannie Brown
text:
Red Dog Sitting Services has been a blessing for my entire family.
We have been using their services for many years now and I can highly recommend them.
The owners and staff are great, they help take away all the stress and anxiety of being away from your pets because you know that they are well taken care of in their own home! This is huge for me.
Updates and pictures with every visit. The mail is picked up, the thermostat and lights adjusted as needed.  Any special instructions, meds or even their flea and tick meds have been administered as needed while I was away. I can truly say that I could not ask for a better service or for better people, this makes me happy. Thank you Red Dog!

resp.text: Thank you for this! We appreciate you 😊😊

name: James Thomas
text: My wife and I have utilized Red Dog Sitting Services since Karl and Cydney started. After 10 years, hands down we would not trust anyone else with looking after our furry children.

resp.text: Thank you for this wonderful endorsement. We value our long-time relationship with you and your trust!! 😊😊

name: DAWN OWENS
text: I've used RedDog for about 10 years to care for my babies.  They remain in touch with me if there is even the slightest issue with my pet, provide detailed updates, photos, etc so I don't miss a beat when I'm gone!  I wouldn't trust anyone else!

resp.text: This is really valuable, thank you so much Dawn!! 😊

name: Whitney Emery
text: I’m so thankful my neighbor recommended RedDog to us last year because it has been a game changer when we travel. We know our “Furr Kingdom” , as Karl calls it, will be well looked after and all of our babies will get the love and attention they need. Our regular sitter, Jackie, immediately clicked with 3 of ours who are reluctant with strangers. It is more than just taking care of the pets though. Jackie reached out to me after the tragic and sudden loss of my brother. She keeps us well informed while we are gone and sends photo updates. RedDog has been such a blessing and we will undoubtably continue to use them.

resp.text: This is wonderful! Thank you Whitney 😊 we are honored to be of service 😊😊😊

name: Aine Fox
text: I was so impressed with owner, the responsivness, the professionalism and most of all the wonderful Margaret ann who treated my dogs as her own and sent pictures and videos frequently. A++++++×

resp.text: Thank you for this wonderful review!! It is our pleasure to be of service 😊😊😊

name: Kathy Lovell
text: RedDog is amazing... They are wonderful!!!! They take such good care of our kiddos!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much Kathy!! We appreciate you 😊😊😊

name: Eric Schrandt
text: In 3 years of watching our dogs we never had any issues. Someone always came as scheduled and our dogs were happy.

resp.text: Thank you for this Eric! 😊😊

name: Timothy Gawne
text: Utterly reliable and professional.  They are not just watching the dog, they are a set of eyes and ears for the house as well.  A lifesaver if we are out of town and something goes wrong.  Recommend without reservation.

resp.text: Thank you for this wonderful review Tim! We appreciate your long-time patronage and look forward to many returns 😊

name: Joe Jolly
text: We have used RedDog for the past six years, when we first brought home our two english bulldog puppies, Hank and Louie. I had been taking them to my office for awhile, but they got too big and rambunctious. They were still too young to be left alone all day. RedDog was a lifesaver. They took care of the boys, plus the other three adult bulldogs we already had. We have never had less than five dogs at once, which always made traveling or overnight trips a hassle. Boarding that many dogs was expensive, not to mention traumatic for them, having to be away from home. RedDog stepped in there as well, providing overnight service for our crew in our own home! The peace of mind this gave us when we were away is beyond words. Over the years, our crew has grown and changed, adding in granddogs as well. Currently, we have 11 dogs in and out of our home!! This includes 4 new French bulldog puppies! Again, these needed extra attention, and RedDog was there, providing twice daily visits for the pups. We also have a special needs bulldog, who wears diapers at all times, as well as special medications. RedDog never balked. They change Lily’s diapers, give her meds, and whatever else is needed. We get photo updates at every visit, as well as special texts if there are any specific concerns. RedDog has even taken one of our dogs to the vet when a scuffle broke out and she was injured. We cannot say enough about, nor recommend RedDog more highly. They are a part of our family, and we would not trust anyone else with our crew!

resp.text: Thank you, Joe, for this amazing review!  We consider y’all a part of our family as well. :-)

name: Therese Laeger
text: We have relied on Red Dog Sitting in various ways to help us be sure that our dog, Suti, is well taken care of when we're out of town or have super busy schedules during the work day.  Each sitter/walker, walked, fed and spent time with him were affecionate, responsible and cheerful in their care.   Communication with sheduling and requests are pleasant and very professional.  We continue to and will continue to trust Red Dog with helping us take good care of Suti.

resp.text: Thank you for this Therese! We look forward to many returns 😊

name: Mazie Marchiony
text: Karl and Cydney Buchholz at Red Dog Sitting have taken care of our pets since 2013. We have peace of mind because we know our dearly loved pets are safe and content at home, getting excellent care, love, and attention.  The sitters are great, sending text updates with pictures for each visit.  Karl and Cydney met personally with us before the first visit, getting to know us, our pets, and our expectations.  Cydney schedules visits in a professional manner, taking note of special requests.  On the rare occasions we need to communicate directly while traveling, a simple email gets a quick response.  We highly recommend their services with no reservations.

resp.text: Thank you very much Mazie!! We value your long relationship with us 😊😊😊

name: Cheryl Grissom
text: We’ve been using RedDog for about 4 years now.  We use them weekly for dog walking and also to look after our cats and goldfish when we are out of town.  One cat requires medications daily.  They don’t charge extra for giving meds, it’s included in the visit.  When our cat has hidden we’ve asked them to flip mattresses over, run the vacuum, really whatever to get the cat out from under the bed so she can get her meds.  Once they couldn’t find her and came back later that day to give her meds.  They only charged me for one visit.  The owners Karl and Cydney are always so nice and responsive to requests.  They typically send out the same people so you and your pets get used to them.  Our dog walker Cynthia is the absolute sweetest and even our neighbor commented on how nice she was and how sweet she treats our dog Bella.  I know other people who use them and I’ve only heard great things from them as well.  I’m so glad I found RedDog!

resp.text: Thank you, Cheryl, for this amazing review!  We appreciate your business :)

name: Andrea White
text: We use Red Dog to care for my father's cats as he is homebound, frail and cognitively impaired (and has sitters of his own!).  The two Red Dog sitters assigned to care for his cats come Mon-Fri and feed the kitties, give them cuddle time, clean the litter pans and change them out every other week, and take photos with daily messages to me about how they're doing and any issues encountered during the visit.  (A family member takes care of the cats the other 2 days/week.)  The Red Dog team has been great eyes and ears for the cats and also for anything else amiss they notice.  On one occasion when one cat was sick, the sitter offered to take the cat to the vet for me because I was still at work.    Very competent, caring sitters who love animals and will go the extra mile to help the animals be well cared for.  Also of note, working with the owners, Cyd & Karl, has been very nice.  They are very responsive by email and phone and offer great customer service and flexibility.  Can whole heartedly endorse Red Dog for animal sitting!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the wonderful review! We appreciate it!!

name: Andrew Warnberg
text:
I have been using Red Dog right at three years now and they are a God sent. They have truly saved us in last minute situations in taking the absolute best care of our cats (we have three very spoiled cats). At the very start, I met with Karl (one of the owners) who met with our cats to understand their habitat and basically to make sure we were a good fit with them and they with us. Like I said previously, they have helped us in and out of last minute situations. As a cancer patient, I would be checked into hospitals and facilities sometimes out of town and at the very last minute. Having a working relationship with Red Dog has really helped facilitate taking care of our babies if they needed access to the house (they already had a key) or if the babies ran out of food during the unexpected stay and they purchased food till we could get home with a reimbursement. Needless to say, we can sleep a whole lot better at night when we are out of town and get those pictures of our babies at the end of the day that our sitter has sent to us via email or text. Pictures not only of the cats but also any packages that may have come, mail, a clean food area and litter area, not to mention attention given to the babies during the visit including playtime.

Red Dog Sitting Services are absolutely the BEST sitting services that we have ever had and have had no problem recommending them to all of our pet lovers in a heartbeat.

resp.text: We appreciate you Andrew!

name: Rose Jolly
text: When we added 2 bulldog puppies to our family, we decided to hire a sitting service to let them out with our other dogs at lunchtime while we were at work.  Eventually, we also had to ask for an overnight stay or two.  After more than 5 years, we still use RedDog for our 4 English Bulldogs and 3 French Bulldogs.  Our sitters have always come at the time we expect, given our babies great care and love, texted cute photos to us from the visit, and been extremely trustworthy.  A few years ago when we went on an Alaskan cruise, we were gone for over a week and a bit anxious about leaving our dogs.  RedDog came in the middle of every day and again at dinnertime for the overnight stays.  One of our dogs had a health issue, and our sitter even went by our vet's office to pick up a prescription.  Now that's service!  Our dogs are our "children", and RedDog is like family!

resp.text: Thank you Rosie!! 😊

name: Sharon Zeng
text:
This was my first time using a pet sitting service. I found RedDog through a Google search. From beginning to end, I received exceptional service. On their website, they have all the information you need to get started. The owners, Karl and Cydney, were the nicest and most helpful people. I loved that Karl responded to my calls and texts quickly. I felt comfortable asking him any questions I had. They understood that I was uneasy about letting a stranger in my home, especially when they knew I was far away. Karl and Cydney eased my worries, and quickly got me set up with a meet and greet and all the paperwork.
Ashley was my sitter, and she was just as fantastic! She paid attention to every single little instruction and detail I gave her. She visited during the agreed time and sent me updates with many cute pictures of my 2 cats! Both of my cats LOVED her! Even my shy cat that doesn't like strangers, warmed up to her on the first day.
Because of RedDog, I was able to enjoy my vacation worry free! I can tell there was a difference in my cats when I came home; they weren't stressed like they used to be when I left them home alone!
I'd recommend RedDog to anyone looking for a pet sitter while they are away. They were all so friendly, attentive, and they cared about the wellbeing and happiness of my cats just as much as I do.

resp.text: Thank you for this wonderful review, Sharon!
